 Sead Haksabanovic, never heard of him mate, and never have you, don’t act it.
Maybe the Sorare enthusiasts have, but that’s it. 
Anyway the Daily Record are reporting we’re signing him and he is YET another attacking player which provides us with even more depth in those areas. 


Sead Haksabanovic sets heart on Celtic transfer as Ange Postecoglou poised to trump FOUR clubs for Rubin Kazan star | @ScottBurns75 & Craig Swanhttps://t.co/K8jBFPzFB4 pic.twitter.com/BtEn6BlZlh— Daily Record Sport (@Record_Sport) August 18, 2022



With this guy JETTING IN, you’d suspect a couple will be on the way out, most notably Michael Johnston, perhaps not even on loan anymore, but permanently. 
Here’s a Youtube compilation, as it to be expected with just about any footballer we’re set to sign that’s relatively obscure to us fans

We’ll look ahead to Hearts on Sunday - tomorrow!
articles.title: Celtic signing this Haksabanovic boy - reports
